programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Ruža pre nevestu II
programme.sub-title: Romantická zoznamovacia šou
programme.desc: Romantická zoznamovacia reality šou Ruža pre nevestu prichádza s 2. sériou! Na ceste plnej dobrodružstva, exotiky, vzrušujúcich stretnutí, emócií, ale aj intríg stretne príťažlivý a úspešný 34-ročný podnikateľ Radko Urbanyak celkovo 18 žien, s ktorými sa bude v priebehu 12 epizód postupne zoznamovať, zbližovať a vyberať si z nich svoju potenciálnu životnú partnerku. Každá z nich je výraznou individualitou, ktorá sa usiluje vytvoriť si svoj vlastný príbeh lásky s Radkom v hlavnej úlohe. Avšak na konci v dramatickom a emotívnom finále zostane už iba jedna žena. Prijme napokon jeho poslednú ružu a stane sa z nich skutočný, láskou naplnený pár? Moderuje Krištof Králik.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Najkrajšia bytovka: Ildikó sa opäť ráno vracia rozžiarená v župane domov s veľkým balíkom. László začína vážne žiarliť. Neupokojí ho ani to, že Ildikó len dala opäť urobiť veľké svadobné fotografie Milky a Gergeja. Andrejka zapája všetkých do súťaže o najkrajšiu bytovku. Núti ich upratať a vyzdobiť kvetmi balkón, umyť okná, z trávnika okolo domu vyzbierať smeti a psie výkaly a dokonca si aj poumývať autá na parkovisku. Ildikó opäť prichytí Gergeja s Andrejkou takmer inflagranti! Susedia sa rozhodnú, že Andrejke musia nájsť partnera, aby správnym smerom usmernili jej energiu a zachránili Milkine manželstvo. Ako zareaguje Milka na údajnú Gergejovu neveru? Podarí sa všetkým spoločne získať diplom pre najkrajšiu bytovku? Prečo dala Ildi tentoraz svadobné fotografie zarámovať aj so sklom? Kto odvezie Lászlóa a Františka do nemocnice a bude ich obetavosť odmenená úspešným vyriešením tejto situácie?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Výročník: Minulý týždeň dal László Františkovi darček. Podpivník z podniku kde sa pred 30-timi rokmi začalo ich priateľstvo. František mu na oplátku daroval pohár z piva, ktoré tam píjavali. Lenže na fotografii s čašníčkou Lucianou s bujným poprsím, z ktorej každý opatruje jednu polovicu, vidno že v krčme sa čapovala úplne iná značka! Pre Lászlóa je to koniec ich priateľstva. Ildikó aj Zuzane vadí, že Andrejkin nový frajer, doktor Vojtíšek, v snahe zapadnúť, je veľmi "vlezlý". Je ale veľmi slušný a takého človeka je ťažko vyhodiť. Zuzana chce z ich štvorice doplnenej o Martu vytvoriť silnú komunitu, aby pochopil, že tam nepatrí a dal pokoj. Lenže najprv musia udobriť Lászlóa s Františkom. Uskutočnia happening, kde zrekonštruujú ich prvé stretnutie. Čo odhalia pri hľadaní dobových rekvizít vo Františkovej "škatuli na spomienky"? Čo spája Lászlóa a Františka s atraktívnou čašníčkou okrem spomienok? Podarí sa im ju po toľkých rokoch nájsť? Ako dopadne celé udobrovanie?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Babský večer: Marta je frustrovaná, musí variť, aby si udržala chlapa. Zuzana má tiež všetkého po krk. Rozhodnú sa, že jeden deň v mesiaci bude "babský večer". Šampanské, vodná fajka a striptér! A najlepšie, ak sa to uskutoční ešte dnes. Andrejka musí zrušiť romantickú večeru s frajerom, a Ildikó, musí zorganizovať stráženie Ágoštona Lászlóom a Františkom u Milky, ktorá na nich dohliadne. Zuzana Milku na akciu nechce pozývať, lebo pred dcérou, by sa nedokázala uvoľniť. František s Lászlóom pre Ágoštona a Evana vymyslia program na Lesnej správe. László si pre istotu dá dvojnásobnú dávku nových piluliek na upokojenie. Ako dopadne detský deň na Lesnej správe? Podarí sa Marte zohnať náhradu za striptéra, ktorý ochorel? Aké vedľajšie účinky má predávkovanie sa Lászlóovými tabletkami? Čo na babskej žúrke bez manželov a partnerov robí Martin frajer?! A kto nepozvaný sa tam ešte objaví?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Pytačky: Zuzana má problém - drobné poškodenie cudzieho auta na parkovisku pred domom. Aj Milka má problém: s Gergejom si rozdelili náklady, ale energie a voda čo mal na starosti ostali nezaplatené. Prosí Františka, aby sa porozprával s Lászlóom a vyriešili to. Zuzana sa však “naštartuje" a ide to riešiť ona. Aj Ildi má problém, na parkovisku jej niekto oškrel auto. László sa chystá, že odhalí páchateľa. Keď príde Zuzana s Milkinou sťažnosťou, Ildi preberá iniciatívu a ide vysvetliť Milke, že je to nedorozumenie. Radšej by sa ona mala o Gergeja viac starať a najlepšie by bolo, keby počali spoločné dieťa. Inak si bude Andrejka stále brúsiť zuby na svojho bývalého frajera. Andrejkin nový priateľ - doktor Vojtíšek, nie je žiadna záruka. Andrejka však potrebuje poradiť. Spozorovala náznaky, že Bobík, ju chce požiadať o ruku. Všetci sú opatrní a radia jej vyčkať. Len Ildikó ju chce okamžite presvedčiť, aby povedala áno! Lászlóa a Františka na lesnej správe prekvapí aj doktor, ktorý hľadá radu v rovnakej veci. Bude László proti vlastnému presvedčeniu tlačiť Andrejku a Bobíka do zásnub? Dozvie sa Ildikó, kto jej oškrel auto? Ako to dopadne, ak požiada Bobík Andrejku naozaj o ruku? A prečo sa u Františka koná ďalšie stretnutie o 3 dni neskôr?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Kto za pravdu horí. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Horná Dolná potrebuje vlastné noviny. Starosta si robí starosti, koho dôležitou úlohou poverí. Nakoniec prácu šéfredaktora zverí Lackovi. Lacko však chce byť investigatívny novinár, takže sa zakrátko stane postrachom celej dediny...

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Bezdomovec. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: : Do Hornej Dolnej sa priplichtí bezdomovec. A akurát v deň, keď Ďurovi rozkvapkali oči, takže je v tom nevinne, pretože šoférovala Erika...

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Obojok. Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ďuro opäť raz zvalcuje Sojku. Lenže tentoraz je to naozaj vážne. Sojka je v bezvedomí a Ďura pri tom videli ozajstní policajti. Ďuro tak musí byť exemplárne potrestaný...

programme.title: Smotánka
programme.sub-title: Nevšedný svet kľúčovou dierkou
programme.desc: Spoločenské akcie, honosné večierky a zábavné párty - miesta, kde sa bežný smrteľník len tak ľahko nedostane, ale s našou kamerou je možné nahliadnuť na miesta, kde to vrie zábavou, nádhernými róbami a známymi tvárami. Najaktuálnejšie dianie v spoločenskom živote, svet recepcií a večierkov, exkluzívne rozhovory s celebritami a tie najnovšie pikošky - vyberte sa so Smotánkou do prostredia „horných desaťtisíc"! Relácia, v ktorej vás svetom smotánky sprevádza šarmantná moderátorka Erika Judínyová.

programme.title: Doktori
programme.sub-title: Strelci. Seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Ľubor a Maroš sú najlepší priatelia. Až takí dobrí, že sa delia o Marošovu ženu, len Maroš by o tom nemal vedieť. Keď Maroš dovezie postreleného Ľubora do nemocnice, všetko nasvedčuje tomu, že Maroš o aférke jeho ženy vedel a chcel si to s kamarátom vyriešiť raz a navždy. Značnej pozornosti sa v nemocnici dožaduje aj prominentná hypochondrička Jarmilka, ktorá pravidelne terorizuje profesora svojim presvedčením, že je ťažko chorá. Profesor ju hodí na krk mladej doktorke Simone, ktorá ale svojim ľahkovážnym prístupom dá protekčnej Jarmilke poriadnu príučku. Tomáš by chcel zo svojho staronového bytu dostať preč Klárin starý klavír. Kláru ku klavíru viažu spomienky na spoločný život s Tomášom a nemieni sa ho ani na nátlak Roberta vzdať. Už ostáva zohnať iba štyroch zdatných chlapov, ktorí klavír presťahujú. No prvými zištnými dobrovoľníkmi sú iba Kubo s Matejom...

programme.title: Doktori
programme.sub-title: ... alebo trop. Seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Dáša, majiteľka obchodu so stavebným materiálom, skolabuje v práci. Má rozsiahle trombózy a jej stavu mohla dopomôcť aj zvýšená hladina hormónov. Jej manžel však tvrdí, že Dáša hormonálnu antikoncepciu neberie, práve naopak, už nejaký čas sa pokúšajú o dieťa. Do Bratislavy prichádza svetovo uznávaný kardiochirurg, prof. Muller, a Tomáš dodá mladému lekárovi Salnerovi odvahu a prehovorí ho, aby sa uchádzal o prácu v Mullerovom tíme. Keď sa MUDr. Marton dozvie o plánoch mladšieho kolegu, začne uvažovať rovnako. Ale prešibaná Simona spolu s Matejom prejde neprajnému Martonovi cez rozum a Martonovi plány nevyjdú ani zďaleka tak ako si plánoval. Navyše, aj profesor Muller sa nečakane ocitne na operačnom stole Kardiocentra, kde ho excelentne zoperuje Tomáš. Tomášovi počas tejto hektickej nočnej „pôjde karta“ aj v inom smere a stane sa to, v čo ani vo svojich najtajnejších snoch nerátal...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: (Bez)nádej: Daniela a Tomáš sú manželmi tri roky, no zatiaľ nepomýšľajú na založenie rodiny. Obaja totiž preferujú bezstarostný život. Naopak Tomášov brat Jakub má opačné priority, s manželkou sa už roky neúspešne snažia o potomka. Obe rodiny však v krátkom čase musia prehodnotiť svoje postoje...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Adopcia: Zuzana a Vlado svojho druhorodeného syna Lea vychovávajú veľmi prísne. Najmä Vlado má pocit, že starostlivosť o pubertiaka mu prerastá cez hlavu – o to viac nástojí na disciplíne. Leo má podozrenie, že Vlado nie je jeho otec...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Jubileum: Natália a Samo budú rok šťastnými manželmi. Natália na rozdiel od Sama pochádza z lepších pomerov, aj preto sa jej otec stále nezmieril s tým, koho si jeho dcéra zobrala. Ona mu však chce stoj čo stoj ukázať, že sa mýli...

programme.title: Varte s nami
programme.desc: Kulinárska relácia s receptami, tipmi a trikmi šéfkuchára Marcela Ihnačáka a cukrárky Veroniky Bušovej! Čakajú vás neoceniteľné tipy a tajné triky, ako rýchlo a jednoducho pripravíte hotový gurmánsky zážitok, ale i recepty dvoch majstrov varešky, ktorými Marcel a Veronika nepochybne sú...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Prsteň. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: Františkova dcéra Milka má meniny a otec jej ako darček pripraví pekný prsteň. László sa však dovtípi, že prsteň je darček pre Ildikó a zachváti ho žiarlivosť – žeby si začal ako riaditeľ so svojou sekretárkou? Poradcu mu robí skúsená susedka Marta.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Posteľ. Komediálny seriál SR (2007).
programme.desc: František zohnal pre dcéru Milku novú posteľ. Má však problém – očakávaná záloha z výplaty mu nestačí na doplatok za privezenie a zmontovanie postele. Idikó trápi podozrenie, že syn Gergely sa zaplietol so susedou Sladkou, ktoré ho láka do svojho bytu a rozhodne sa celú situáciu vyšetriť.

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: ročná Martina sa obrátila na Svokru, aby jej pomohla s jej štyrmi deťmi, keďže ich výchovu, kvôli jej najstaršiemu synovi s poruchovým správaním, nezvláda. Takisto aj jej manželstvo nie je to, čo kedysi.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Baránok Boží: Anna a Martin žijú v bezproblémovom manželstve vyše 20 rokov. Na budúcnosť ich jediného syna Petra však majú odlišný názor. Zatiaľ čo Anna chce mať z neho bežného pracujúceho človeka, Martin ho chce obetovať Bohu...

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Zásnuby: Marekovi rodičia chcú prísť na návštevu, ale Marek o nich nepovie Zuzane a Františkovi všetko. Milka im oznámi, že chcú hovoriť o kúpe bytu pre "mladých", ale vtom ich vyruší László. Zistil, že Ildikó má stretnutie s riaditeľom v kostýmoch Snehulienky a Batmana. Marek sa pokúsi odkázať dôležitú informáciu o rodičoch cez Lászla. László je urazený, lebo by rád aj s Ildi prišiel na oslavu, ale nie sú pozvaní. László teda Františkovi povie úplný opak toho čo je pravda. Navyše od rána silno prší. Ako to celé dopadne, keď sa do toho zapojí ešte aj poštár a Zuzanin architekt?

programme.title: Búrlivé víno
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2013).
programme.desc: Stanislavov zdravotný stav je vážny. Martin zažíva krušné chvíle v strachu o otca, je rád, že má pri sebe Ninu. Viera má však iný názor – veď jej muž zinfarktoval kvôli jej otcovi Ivanovi. Posiela Ninu z nemocnice preč. Eva sa od Laury dozvie, že za jej nehodou stojí Robo. Eva na neho podá trestné oznámenie. Robo spracováva Ildikó, aby mu robila alibi. Ako sa rozhodne Ildikó – povie na polícii pravdu alebo sa nechá Robom zastrašiť? Slávo podrazí otca. Nič netušiacemu Ivanovi podstrčí na podpis zmluvu o predaji podniku. Zmluvu donesie Roznerovcom, ktorých oklame, že ju podpísal otec - na znak toho, že Stanislavovi odpustil. Nina prehovorí Ivanovi do duše – Stanislav skolaboval a ide mu o život. No Ivan mu napriek tomu odmieta odpustiť, podľa neho si infarkt zaslúžil! Nina je otcovým postojom šokovaná. Stanislav zatiaľ v nemocnici zvádza boj o svoj život...

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dievča: Marta a Róza sú dôchodkyne, ktoré žijú v obyčajnej bytovke. Nemajú sa veľmi čím zaoberať, preto pravidelne komentujú udalosti v okolí. Najnovšou témou sa stáva pre nich rozvedený Tomáš, ktorý prechádza ťažkým obdobím. A navyše si do bytu vodí nezvyčajne mladé dievča...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Precitnutie: Štyridsiatnička Dagmar je manželkou úspešného podnikateľa Františka. Ten po búrlivom rozvode a narodení syna dúfal v pohodlný život. Kedysi bola Dagmar jeho trofejou, s ktorou sa rád ukazoval. Nastúpila však každodenná realita a život už zďaleka nebol taký idylický ako kedysi. Navyše Dagmar začala mať zdravotné problémy...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Búrlivé víno
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2013).
programme.desc: Eva vyhľadá Ildiko a podarí sa jej prehovoriť ju, aby svedčila proti Robovi... Ivan má ostrý konflikt so Slávom kvôli podvodu s predajom podniku. Slávo mal na to svoje dôvody, cíti sa otcom nedocenený. V návale hnevu mu vykričí, že by bol radšej, keby vtedy umrel namiesto mamy. Ivan syna vyhodí z domu. Slávo sa chce nasťahovať k Ingrid a utratiť s ňou peniaze od Roznera. Inge z toho však vôbec nie je nadšená. Stanislav sa zotavuje po operácii, teší sa z kúpy podniku. Rodina mu zamlčí okolnosti, za ktorých k predaju došlo. Ivan trvá na tom, že zmluva o predaji je podvod, ale Peter sa kvôli otcovi odmieta podniku vzdať. Ivan prichytí Ninu a Martina spolu. Zakazuje Nine mať niečo s Roznerovcami. Nina sa prizná, že sa do Martina zamilovala. Je rozhodnutá za svoju lásku bojovať napriek konfliktu ich rodín. To ešte netuší, že im v ceste stojí iná prekážka. Na stretnutie Niny a Martina nečakane príde Karin... Ako sa zachová Martin?

programme.title: Ruža pre nevestu II
programme.sub-title: Romantická zoznamovacia šou
programme.desc: Romantická zoznamovacia reality šou Ruža pre nevestu prichádza s 2. sériou! Na ceste plnej dobrodružstva, exotiky, vzrušujúcich stretnutí, emócií, ale aj intríg stretne príťažlivý a úspešný 34-ročný podnikateľ Radko Urbanyak celkovo 18 žien, s ktorými sa bude v priebehu 12 epizód postupne zoznamovať, zbližovať a vyberať si z nich svoju potenciálnu životnú partnerku. Každá z nich je výraznou individualitou, ktorá sa usiluje vytvoriť si svoj vlastný príbeh lásky s Radkom v hlavnej úlohe. Avšak na konci v dramatickom a emotívnom finále zostane už iba jedna žena. Prijme napokon jeho poslednú ružu a stane sa z nich skutočný, láskou naplnený pár? Moderuje Krištof Králik.

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Obľúbená reality šou Farma je na konci! Neuveriteľná 14. séria sa opäť predstavila v originálnom novom koncepte a s množstvom zaujímavých prekvapení, ktorým bola pre farmárov nepochybne aj umelá inteligencia Alica. Kto vyhrá 75-tisíc eur? Bude to muž alebo žena? Sledujte napínavé finále najúspešnejšej slovenskej reality šou! Moderuje Marek Fašiang a nebude chýbať ani obľúbený hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Aj múdry schybí
programme.sub-title: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym
programme.desc: Zábavná relácia s Elenou Vacvalovou a Oliverom Andrásym

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World
programme.desc: No task is too big, even when you're little! Set to debut in 2023, this preschool spinoff centers on the Creek's favorite resilient little sister, Jessica, as she navigates her way through a world where everything seems much bigger than she is. programme.desc: Wanted. Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Gadget Kid. Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you can’t even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Visitor. Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Big TV. Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Avocado's Fan. Arlo is starstruck by Avocado's popularity and becomes her biggest fan.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Bloom Patrol. Lucas and his friends are excited to see a flower bloom.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part I. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! Alice loves the idea at first, but soon changes her mind when she sees how well her two schoolfriends are getting on with Lewis! How is this even possible?! Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part II. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! Alice loves the idea at first, but soon changes her mind when she sees how well her two schoolfriends are getting on with Lewis! How is this even possible?! Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: What’s That Smell. One cat’s delicacy is another mouse’s poison. Tom and Jerry get caught in a thorny issue over the aroma of durian. Will the King of Fruits help reconcile their differences?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World
programme.desc: No task is too big, even when you're little! Set to debut in 2023, this preschool spinoff centers on the Creek's favorite resilient little sister, Jessica, as she navigates her way through a world where everything seems much bigger than she is. Although she's the youngest and still needs help with a lot, Jessica is inspired by the grown-ups and bigger kids around her and is persistent in her quest to conquer monumental kid tasks like creating a bedtime routine or saying hi to a new classmate. With the help of her friends, imaginary and real, Jessica sets off to take on the world, even if she still does suck her thumb...sometimes.

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World
programme.desc: No task is too big, even when you're little! Set to debut in 2023, this preschool spinoff centers on the Creek's favorite resilient little sister, Jessica, as she navigates her way through a world where everything seems much bigger than she is. With the help of her friends, imaginary and real, Jessica sets off to take on the world, even if she still does suck her thumb...sometimes.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Birthdays. The bugs talk about birthdays.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Fish Out of Water. Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol' Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom can't pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry who's trying to protect him!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Someone's in the Kitchen with Mynah. Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebody's got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: When You Leash Expect It. Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, they're on their way, much to Tom's chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Don't Cut the Cheese. It's that special time of year when the Lady of the House's rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. It's up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Calamari Jerry. Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: Cattyshack. It's time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, he's determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show III
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Hotel Bean. A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Jurassic Bean. Mr Bean is on a photography jaunt in the countryside snapping the normal everyday wildlife – a fox a bird a dinosaur! A DINOSAUR?!! Mr Bean is terrified until he realises what fame and fortune it could bring him. Does he get the photograph of a lifetime or is the situation not quite as it seems?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Caring Bean. Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Opera Bean. Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Flying. After watching Findley in flight, Lucas wonders what it would be like to fly.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Broken Key - Part I. In this special two-part episode, Alice finds Wonderland in a very odd state! The Queen is no longer queen: instead, she’s a peasant who grows carrots. And the Twins are now the castle guards, protecting the residence of the King… who happens to be none other than Lewis! But worse still, the rabbit doesn’t even recognize Alice; in fact, he thinks she’s an intruder who must be chased out of the kingdom and whose key must be confiscated! Could Wonderland be becoming a nightmarish kingdom that’s anything but wonderful?!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Broken Key - Part II. In this special two-part episode, Alice finds Wonderland in a very odd state! The Queen is no longer queen: instead, she’s a peasant who grows carrots. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Feline Fatale. Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cat Nippy. Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland until they realize they can't get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Picture Imperfect. It's picture day! Spike and Tom end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this year's picture.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ghost of a Chance. Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland until they realize they can't get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

Could Wonderland be becoming a nightmarish kingdom that’s anything but wonderful?!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Pizza Bean. Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: The Photograph. Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Dancing Bean. Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Shopping. Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Not a Piece of Cake! When the Wonderland cuckoos realize their precious wild strawberry pies have all been picked, it’s mayhem! They go bonkers, screeching up a storm, almost deafening our poor friends. The Queen subsequently orders Alice and Lewis to put an end to this din! But the mission gets tricky when our two heroes find out who picked the pies!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Snow Queen. Alice and Lewis make a "snow-woman" in the Queen’s likeness. But, miffed at not bearing a very strong resemblance to the original, she heads off to meet her model. Our two heroes are scared: their mockery is about to be discovered! But surprise surprise!: the Queen is anything but offended! In fact, she takes the snow-woman under her wing, even going so far as to appoint her her deputy! Unfortunately for Alice and Lewis, this icy substitute becomes just as moody as the Queen: now they’re going to have to do all they can to remind her who she truly is!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Blue Door Mystery. Queen is seething: her QueenMobile has broken down on the other side of Wonderland and she hasn’t found any blue doors to get her back home. So she commissions Alice and Lewis to draw up a map of all the blue doors in the Kingdom. The mission turns out to be more complicated than expected when our heroes realize the doors in question are VERY FIDGETY!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Trainee Book-Wizards. Before heading off on a trip to find new seeds, the Book-Wizard entrusts his garden to his new apprentices, Alice and Lewis. But it’s a pretty stressful experience: besides having to tend to the garden, they also have to answer the Twins when they come to ask for advice, and entertain the Queen when she decides to turn up unannounced, for teatime! And when Charlie gets whisked away by a bird-book, it’s panic-stations for the two apprentices. In fact, things get so out of hand that they have to call the Book-Wizard to the rescue!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Trying. The bugs talk about trying new things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Singapore with Tom and Jerry as they weave through the labyrinth of towering estates and skyscrapers and bask in the vibrant green of the urban jungle.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Favourite Things. The bugs talk about some of their favourite things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series III

All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike Gets Skooled. Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cat's Ruffled Fur-niture. Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Restaurant. Mr. Bean’s Birthday dinner gets off on the wrong foot when he and Teddy are made to take the worst table at a swanky restaurant. The evening is further ruined by a self-obsessed movie star at the next table. After a swim in the lobster tank, Mr. Bean unwittingly cooks up sweet revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Art thief. During a visit to London's National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean ‘the International Art Sleuth’ prove successful?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scaredy Bean. Who's afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. He's very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Bean’s imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Hot Date. Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Mock Me Not. Lucas playfully mimics Bodhi. But he may have offended her.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Life's Not A Breeze! While feeding the Cutie-Twees, Twee Dum accidentally swallows some “ballooney berries.” As a result, he floats skyward, giving the Breeze-Twee an opportunity to escape! While Lewis gets busy gathering the ingredients for Twee Dum’s antidote, Alice offers to head off with Twee Di to fetch back the escaped Cutie-Twee.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Super-Cutie-Twee. When Alice arrives in Wonderland, she finds Lewis and the Twins captivated by a Cutie-Twee with puppy dog eyes. Wise to its tricks, realizing it’s using its charms to get pampered, Alice goes out of her way to get her friends to see through the Cutie-Twee’s little game. But then the Queen comes along and snatches away the adorable little critter, adopting it as her own personal pet, locked away in the castle!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Time Out! Bugs Daffy and Taz are disciplined by having a time out in the corner.
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.sub-title: Present Tense
programme.desc: Baby Looney Tunes introduces the world's most beloved cartoon characters as precocious preschoolers, discovering the world one baby-step at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: School of Hard Knocks. Like a big brother, Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, makes them both breakfast, gets Tuffy cleaned up, puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol' cat to the house next door where WINSTON waits, greeting his students, a gaggle of mice, including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread, ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion, and today they're going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Tom's house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Brain Food. Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out he's not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; they're covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dog's behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cold Snap. Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches' world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights. Now they have to figure out how to make it stop snowing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The Tortoise Don't Play Fair. When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. It's up to the duo to see what's really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Wish Bone. Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks he's pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Tom's wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Novel Idea. An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing…Tom is writing a novel - it's a mystery novel, of course! Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life (including the femme fatale who has taken an interest in the feline Mikey Spillane). At first, Tom has fun crafting his own fate, but soon realizes no matter how hard he tries to rewrite his story, he gets deeper and deeper into trouble. Jerry begins to suspect the alley cat, Butch, is up to no good – in the end, Jerry figures out Butch was retrieving Tom's discarded writing from the trash and using it to his advantage!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: Cat Match Fever. Butch is bobbing for apple cores when he spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! Butch slicks back his hair with some lard and strikes a pose. But she walks right past the alley cat. Meanwhile, inside the house, Tom spots Toodles headed in his direction. After a quick spruce up, Tom opens the door only to watch her walk right past the house. Tom slumps. Turns out Toodles is headed to Winston's house. Yep, who knew the two were a match made in kitty heaven (or at least that's what the catmatch app said). Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Lord Bean. Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Car Wars. Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Wedding Day. Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Bean Phone. Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider

This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.sub-title: Boot Castle. Findley discovers a boot that him and Lucas use as a castle.
programme.desc: Lucas the Spider follows the adventures of a big hearted, impossibly cute little jumping spider in a human-sized suburban home. This happy, inquisitive, music-loving, 4 year old wants us to join him as he explores and learns about this giant world, spreading love and togetherness whilst having a ton of fun with all his friends.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part I. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! Alice loves the idea at first, but soon changes her mind when she sees how well her two schoolfriends are getting on with Lewis! How is this even possible?! Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part II. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World
programme.desc: No task is too big, even when you're little! Set to debut in 2023, this preschool spinoff centers on the Creek's favorite resilient little sister, Jessica, as she navigates her way through a world where everything seems much bigger than she is. Although she's the youngest and still needs help with a lot, Jessica is inspired by the grown-ups and bigger kids around her and is persistent in her quest to conquer monumental kid tasks like creating a bedtime routine or saying hi to a new classmate. With the help of her friends, imaginary and real, Jessica sets off to take on the world, even if she still does suck her thumb...sometimes.

programme.title: Jessica's Big Little World

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike Gets Skooled. Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cat's Ruffled Fur-niture. Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Sleep Disorder. Rick buys Ginger a brand new mattress with a lot of high tech features. Tom is under strict orders to never sleep on it but Butch convinces him to try it out. Jerry uses the controls against them and soon that mattress is out of control and destroys the entire house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show II
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom's In-Tents Adventure. Tom and Jerry get a taste of the great outdoors on their camping trip to Yosemite. Tom tries hard to get some relaxation but nature and all its inhabitants including bears get in his way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part I. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! Alice loves the idea at first, but soon changes her mind when she sees how well her two schoolfriends are getting on with Lewis! How is this even possible?! Then, Alice finds out there’s a huge danger looming over Wonderland (could it have something to do with Bastien and Carole’s presence here?!). What if their being here causes Wonderland to vanish?! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Surprise Guests - Part II. Bastien and Carole make friends with a new student at school, inviting them to play with them every time. Alice is worried she’ll lose her place in the group because of it. Unsettled, she rushes to Wonderland to see Lewis. But when she gets there, she finds Bastien and Carole are there too! Or what if this is just one big nightmare?...

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Birthday Party. Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: In The Garden. Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: A Magic Day Out. Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series II
programme.desc: Ball Pool. Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Tooth the Rescue! When one of Lewis’ teeth falls out, no little tooth fairy comes to see him. Instead, the whole of Wonderland converges upon him! Basically, in this world, a loose tooth is an opportunity for making a wish, which makes it a very sought-after commodity among the Wonderlanders!! In the midst of all this squabbling, Alice must use cunning to help her good friend Lewis hold onto his precious tooth!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Journey to the Moon. While delivering a yummy stew to the Queen, Alice and Lewis notice the moon is crying and that its falling tears are flooding the castle! Afraid her royal residence is about to collapse any minute, Queen orders Alice and Lewis to find a solution to this problem on the double! And so off they go to the moon, where a whole plethora of surprises awaits them.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Seam Stress. Today, Queen has decided to commission a unique dress from her talented Seamstress Card: she wants it made out of wild thread – a very difficult one to tame! And should her Seamstress Card fail to pull it off, she will be relieved of her duties on the spot! Alice and Lewis jump to it, coming up with all kinds of bright ideas to help out the poor card. As a result, in the end, a whole cat walk of dresses awaits the Queen!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Freeze-All Cutie-Twee. Alice and Lewis find the twins frozen in place! It turns out to be the doing of a young Freeze-All Cutie-Twee who has become friends with Charlie. In fact, these two besties are having the time of their lives, traveling all over the place, freezing the whole Kingdom, unaware that the young Cutie-Twee has not yet mastered its powers! Alice and Lewis must find a way to persuade Charlie to take the Cutie-Twee back to its peers.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Waiting. The bugs talk about waiting for things they really want.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Mush-Mush And The Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and the Mushables follows the comedy adventures of the Mushable community as together they put the fun back into fungi! As pocket-sized Guardians of the Forest, each Mushable has a special gift; while Mush-Mush can communicate with nature, Lilit shines bright like the light and Chep has an impressive memory. As they get to know thier talents and their limits, the Mushables find there is still a lot to discover about growing up! A fun journey of self-discovery, exciting outdoor adventure and mush mush more!

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.sub-title: Hide N' Seek. The crew plays Hide N’ Seek at headquarters and Tweety is the seeker.
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.
